sn56.34:1.1: “Aditte, bhikkhave, cele va sise va kimassa karaniyan”ti?
sn56.34:1.2: “Aditte, bhante, cele va sise va, tasseva celassa va sisassa va nibbapanaya adhimatto chando ca vayamo ca ussaho ca ussolhi ca appativani ca sati ca sampajannanca karaniyan”ti.
sn56.34:2.1: “Adittam, bhikkhave, celam va sisam va ajjhupekkhitva amanasikaritva anabhisametanam catunnam ariyasaccanam yathabhutam abhisamayaya adhimatto chando ca vayamo ca ussaho ca ussolhi ca appativani ca sati ca sampajannanca karaniyam.
sn56.34:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
